sys_ui_script.description: This UI Script disables the 'Bulk Reassign Transponders' button and Action menu item when no transponders are selected in the list view. The button and Action menu item are enabled when at least one transponder is selected. The script listens for changes in the selection of transponders and updates the button's state accordingly.
sys_ui_script.name: x_89907_vehicle_to.DisableBulkReassignTr
